inclusion.criterion: Age 6-17 years at time of enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Asthma diagnosed by a physician and present for at least one year prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: More than four courses of systemic corticosteroids for asthma during the 12 months prior to study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current treatment with antibiotics for diagnosed sinus disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has asthma and meets inclusion criteria. However, current treatment with antibiotics for diagnosed sinus disease is unknown.
